item.title: Golden Death Music
item.description:
goldendeath says: "Hello I hope you are doing very well today and all days. I'm writing this message to let people know that I just put some new music up on my page , and should have another album out very soon! I also made all the tracks on that album free for download. If you are unfamiliar with my music, I'm sorry to have bothered you, but I invite you to check it out. I truly wish only the best for you all. Thanks for your time!
/Michael www.myspace.com/goldendeathmusic"
